Hello there... This app contain APK Manager, App Explorer, Root File Manager etc. This is also my first app and part og my androi learning experience. after learning enough, I would like to develop the app professionally and make this app available for others. Copy & Share Tab 1 Tab 2 Tab 3 Tab 4 in app notifications will be shown Here Grant Permission By Adding Storages Here. Click (+) Grant Permission to Write to Storages. Click Add and Select Root of theStorage Click to to Parent Directory Storage +
